attributes.action: Scrap the current benefit system because it is in chaos and cauing untold suffering for those who need it most.
attributes.additional_details: The DWP is in total chaos with waiting times for ESA and PIP over 6 months and even longer. People who are in the most need are being forced to suffer and in many cases there is blatant discrimination against British citizens. It is time to scrap this meaningless system.
